overview: Benjamin gets bullied by a son of a mafia boss, Johan Schweiger, while he was on a run. Benjamin teaches him a lesson by breaking his arm. Crime boss Ulrich Schweiger gets so pissed and organises an attack on Benjamin's house. Ben and his homemate Theo survives but during the attack, Ben loses a little friend of him. Later that, the Schweiger family begins to realize that they messed with the wrong guy.
title: Die Rache
